verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, If a \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* have conceived \w seed|strong="H2232"\w*, and \w born|strong="H3205"\w* a man \w child|strong="H2145"\w*: then she shall be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*; according to the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w separation|strong="H5079"\w* for her \w infirmity|strong="H1738"\w* shall she be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w*.
And in the \w eighth|strong="H8066"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* of his \w foreskin|strong="H6190"\w* shall be \w circumcised|strong="H4135"\w*.

And she shall then \w continue|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of her \w purifying|strong="H2893"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* and \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*; she shall \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* no \w hallowed|strong="H6944"\w* thing, nor \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*, until the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of her \w purifying|strong="H2892"\w* be \w fulfilled|strong="H4390"\w*.

But if she \w bear|strong="H3205"\w* a maid \w child|strong="H5347"\w*, then she shall be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* two \w weeks|strong="H7620"\w*, as in her \w separation|strong="H5079"\w*: and she shall \w continue|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of her \w purifying|strong="H2893"\w* \w threescore|strong="H8346"\w* and \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

And when the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of her \w purifying|strong="H2892"\w* are \w fulfilled|strong="H4390"\w*, for a \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, or for a \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, she shall \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* a \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w* of the \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* for a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, and a \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w pigeon|strong="H3123"\w*, or a \w turtledove|strong="H8449"\w*, for a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, unto the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, unto the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*:\f + \fr 12.6 \ft of the first…: Heb. a son of his year\f*

Who shall \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* it \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for her; and she shall be \w cleansed|strong="H2891"\w* from the \w issue|strong="H4726"\w* of her \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*. This \add is\add* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* for her that hath \w born|strong="H3205"\w* a \w male|strong="H2145"\w* or a \w female|strong="H5347"\w*.

And if she be not able to \w bring|strong="H4672"\w* a \w lamb|strong="H7716"\w*, then she shall \w bring|strong="H3947"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w turtles|strong="H8449"\w*, or two \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w pigeons|strong="H3123"\w*; the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* for the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, and the \w other|strong="H0259"\w* for a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*: and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for her, and she shall be \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*.\f + \fr 12.8 \ft she be…: Heb. her hand find not sufficiency of\f*
